item.title: A new R package darklyplot
item.description: Today I try my hand at building an [R] package called darklyplot. This package is a little extension of ggplot2 to create a dark themed time series plot. This packages lets you create simple dark-theme times series plots. It extends ggplot2 and relies on mdthemes to make color coded axis labels. The axis labels use ggthemes::geom_rangeframe to create Tufte-like axes. Through parameters, the user can alter the colors, include shading under the line, and also add a single reference line.
